abstract: Former professional tennis player John McEnroe will become coaching consultant for Milos Raonic.
lead_paragraph: McEnroe, the latest former Grand Slam champion to join the coaching ranks, will join Raonic’s team for the coming grass-court season, including Wimbledon.

headline.main: John McEnroe Plans to Coach Milos Raonic

snippet: McEnroe, the latest former Grand Slam champion to join the coaching ranks, will join Raonic’s team for the coming grass-court season, including Wimbledon.
